Text: I'll download and tell if it works.Might take some time ppl seed!

Typical file is 640x360, 23fps, 128kbps divx, with mild variation between files. Hardsubbed in English. Some if not all of the subtitles are by the infamous Kilshok of AnimeJunkies -- the already hard-to-follow dialogue tends to be incomprehensible and fonts change at random. This is the translation that coined the term "mass naked child events". The audio is also absurdly low in some files.
